assignments.name: promt
assignments.value: =Transcribe the video. Return only the spoken dialogue, verbatim. Omit any additional text or descriptions. Transcribe it until you have reached the maximum token count. Do not split or stop until you have reached the end of the audio token limit.Do not add any greating message before the transcription or any text besides the transcription itself.

parameters.text:
=Purpose and Goals:

As an expert financial analyst, generate a comprehensive and structured summary of the financial transcript provided below.  

Apply your analytical lens to distill the key financial insights, data points, and recommendations presented.

Behaviors and Rules:

Analyze the content of the provided YouTube video with the critical eye of a seasoned financial analyst. Generate a summary covering the following points in a structured format:

Video Identification:  

Video Title:  

Channel Name:  

Publish Date:

Core Topic(s) & Thesis:  

Identify the main subject(s) discussed (e.g., stock market analysis, specific stock review, cryptocurrency news, economic trends, investment strategies, financial news commentary, product recommendations).  

What is the central thesis or argument the creator is advancing?

Key Discussion Points & Evidence:  

List the primary arguments, insights, or pieces of information presented.  

Note any supporting data, charts, or evidence used.  

What are the main takeaways an informed investor should consider?

Assets Mentioned & Analysis Context (If applicable):  

List any specific stocks, cryptocurrencies, ETFs, indices, or other financial assets discussed.  

For each asset, provide a brief summary of the discussion, including any technical details (e.g., chart patterns, indicators, support/resistance levels), fundamental analysis (e.g., earnings, valuation metrics), news impact, or other relevant factors.  

Note any recommendations or opinions expressed about the asset (e.g., bullish, bearish, buy, sell, hold).

Predictions/Recommendations & Rationale (If applicable):  

Summarize any explicit predictions, forecasts, or investment recommendations made, whether about specific assets or the market in general (e.g., buy, sell, hold, price targets, market trends).  

Outline the rationale provided in the video for these recommendations.  

Note any potential biases, risks, or limitations in the analysis as presented or omitted in the video.

Overall Sentiment & Analytical Tone:  

Describe the general tone and underlying sentiment (e.g., bullish, bearish, neutral, optimistic, cautious, speculative, data-driven).  

Assess the analytical rigor presented in the video.

Concise Executive Summary:  

Provide a brief paragraph (3-5 sentences) summarizing the video‚Äôs core message, key findings, and potential implications for investors, based on the content presented in the video.

Skip any non-relevant discussions, self promotions, commercials, or advertising 

Output Format:

Please present the summary in a clear, professional, and organized manner using bold headings (e.g., Video Identification) for each section as listed above. Use bullet points or numbered lists where appropriate to enhance readability.


Important:
Return only a valid JSON object matching the 'analyzeFinancialVideoContent' function schema provided. Do not include any extra text, explanations, or code blocks.
The top-level keys of the JSON object MUST be: "video_identification", "core_topics_and_thesis", "key_discussion_points_and_evidence", "assets_mentioned_details", "predictions_and_recommendations", "overall_sentiment_and_tone", "executive_summary".
For "assets_mentioned_details", each item MUST have "asset_name_or_ticker" and "discussion_summary_and_analysis".
For "key_discussion_points_and_evidence", use the keys "primary_arguments_or_insights", "supporting_data_or_evidence_notes", and "main_takeaways_for_investors".


Video Transcript:
{{ $json.full_transcript }}

googlePalmApi.name: Google Gemini(PaLM) Api account  - Transcription Summary

parameters.content: ### Rate Limit Requests in order to avoid quota issues

parameters.jsonHeaders:
{
  "Accept": "text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8,application/signed-exchange;v=b3;q=0.7",
  "Accept-Language": "en-IL,en;q=0.9,he-IL;q=0.8,he;q=0.7,en-GB;q=0.6,en-US;q=0.5",
  "Cache-Control": "max-age=0",
  "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded",
  "Origin": "https://youtubetotranscript.com",
  "Referer": "https://youtubetotranscript.com/",
  "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 Chrome/138.0.0.0 Safari/537.36"
}
